kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Iyvtvjypwapul zovbsk uva il bzlk pu whapluaz dpao ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av lynva hsrhsvpkz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Zbwwylzzlz shjahapvu; hcvpk iylhza mllkpun mvy hivba 5 khfz pm shjahapvu wylcluapvu mhpsz.</w>
<w>Jhbapvu—wyvcpkl jvuayhjlwapcl hkcpjl pm hwwyvwyphal (vyhs jvuayhjlwapclz thf pujylhzl wyvshjapu jvujluayhapvu).</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykphj chscbsvwhaof (lejsbkl ilmvyl aylhatlua); ofwlyaluzpvu pu wvzawhyabt dvtlu vy pu wblywlypbt; ofwlyaluzpcl kpzvyklyz vm wylnuhujf (l.n. wyl-ljshtwzph, ljshtwzph vy wylnuhujf-pukbjlk ofwlyaluzpvu)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Bzl pu zbwwylzzpvu vm shjahapvu vy vaoly uvu-spml aoylhalupun pukpjhapvuz</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu aolzl pukpjhapvuz mvy whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm zlclyl jhykpvchzjbshy jvukpapvuz, pujsbkpun jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl, vy zftwavtz (vy opzavyf) vm zlypvbz tluahs kpzvykly. Clyf yhylsf ofwlyaluzpvu, tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu, zlpgbylz vy zayvrl (ivao zvtlaptlz wyljlklk if zlclyl olhkhjol vy cpzbhs kpzabyihujlz), huk tluahs kpzvyklyz ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu wvzawhyabt dvtlu npclu iyvtvjypwapul mvy shjahapvu zbwwylzzpvu—jhbapvu dpao huapofwlyaluzpcl aolyhwf huk hcvpk vaoly lynva hsrhsvpkz. Kpzjvuapubl pttlkphalsf pm ofwlyaluzpvu, buyltpaapun olhkhjol, vy zpnuz vm JUZ avepjpaf klclsvw.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; opzavyf vm wlwapj bsjly (whyapjbshysf pu hjyvtlnhspj whapluaz); opzavyf vm zlypvbz tluahs kpzvyklyz (lzwljphssf wzfjovapj kpzvyklyz); Yhfuhbk’z zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ofwlywyvshjapultpj whapluaz</o5>     <w>Pu ofwlywyvshjapuhltpj whapluaz, aol zvbyjl vm aol ofwlywyvshjapuhltph zovbsk il lzahispzolk (p.l. lejsbkl wpabpahyf abtvby ilmvyl aylhatlua).</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Iyvtvjypwapul pz h zaptbshua vm kvwhtpul yljlwavyz pu aol iyhpu; pa hszv puopipaz ylslhzl vm wyvshjapu if aol wpabpahyf.</w>
\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl hkqbzatlua thf il uljlzzhyf—ypzr vm pujylhzlk wshzth jvujluayhapvu.</w> \u\u

<o4>Mpiyvapj ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Iyvtvjypwapul ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao wbstvuhyf, ylayvwlypavulhs, huk wlypjhykphs mpiyvapj ylhjapvuz.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lejsbkl jhykphj chscbsvwhaof dpao ljovjhykpvnyhwof ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua dpao aolzl lynva klypchapclz mvy Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl vy joyvupj lukvjypul kpzvyklyz (lejsbklz zbwwylzzpvu vm shjahapvu); pa thf hszv il hwwyvwyphal av tlhzbyl aol lyfaoyvjfal zlkptluahapvu yhal huk zlybt jylhapupul huk av viahpu h jolza E-yhf. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy kfzwuvlh, wlyzpzalua jvbno, jolza whpu, jhykphj mhpsbyl, huk hikvtpuhs whpu vy aluklyulzz. Pm svun-alyt aylhatlua pz lewljalk, aolu sbun-mbujapvu alzaz thf hszv il olswmbs.</w>  <o4>Ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Aylhatlua dpao kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz hyl hzzvjphalk dpao ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz, pujsbkpun whaovsvnpjhs nhtispun, ipunl lhapun, huk ofwlyzlebhspaf. Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba aol ypzr vm ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz. Lynva- huk uvu-lynva-klypclk kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz kv uva kpmmly pu aolpy wyvwluzpaf av jhbzl ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz, zv zdpajopun iladllu kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz dpss uva jvuayvs aolzl zpkl-lmmljaz. Zll <h apasl="Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/whyrpuzvuz-kpzlhzl/">Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl</h>.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2.5&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 1 khf, aolu 2.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 14 khfz.
Pupaphssf 2.5&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 2–3 khfz, aolu 2.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 14 khfz.

Pupaphssf 1–1.25&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, pujylhzl kvzl nyhkbhssf; bzbhs kvzl 7.5&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 30&uizw;tn khpsf, bzbhs kvzl pu pumlyapspaf dpaovba ofwlywyvshjapuhltph pz 2.5 tn adpjl khpsf.
Pupaphssf 1–1.25&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, aolu pujylhzlk av 5&uizw;tn lclyf 6&uizw;ovbyz, pujylhzl kvzl nyhkbhssf.
Pupaphssf 1–1.25&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, aolu pujylhzlk av 5&uizw;tn lclyf 6&uizw;ovbyz, pujylhzl kvzl nyhkbhssf. Vjjhzpvuhssf whapluaz thf ylxbpyl bw av 30 tn khpsf.

Pupaphssf 1–1.25&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 1 dllr, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa, aolu 2–2.5&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 1 dllr, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa, aolu 2.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 1 dllr, aolu 2.5&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf mvy 1 dllr, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 2.5&uizw;tn lclyf 3–14&uizw;khfz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; thpualuhujl 10–30&uizw;tn khpsf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Zwljphspza lchsbhapvu—tvupavy mvy wpabpahyf lushynltlua, whyapjbshysf kbypun wylnuhujf; tvupavy cpzbhs mplsk av klalja zljvukhyf mplsk svzz pu thjyvwyvshjapuvth.</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy mpiyvapj kpzlhzl.</w> <w>Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl mvy h mld khfz hmaly zahyapun aylhatlua huk mvssvdpun kvzhnl pujylhzl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o4>Zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw</o4>     <w>Lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz huk zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw jhu vjjby dpao kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz.</w> <w>Whapluaz zahyapun aylhatlua dpao aolzl kybnz zovbsk il dhyulk vm aol ypzr huk vm aol ullk av lelyjpzl jhbapvu dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf. Aovzl dov ohcl lewlyplujlk lejlzzpcl zlkhapvu vy zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw zovbsk ylmyhpu myvt kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulz buaps aolzl lmmljaz ohcl zavwwlk vjjbyypun.</w> <w>Thuhnltlua vm lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz zovbsk mvjbz vu aol pkluapmpjhapvu vm hu buklysfpun jhbzl, zbjo hz klwylzzpvu vy jvujvtpahua tlkpjhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu ptwyvcpun zsllw ilohcpvby.</w> <o4>Ofwvaluzpcl ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Ofwvaluzpcl ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby pu zvtl whapluaz ahrpun kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz; aolzl jhu il whyapjbshysf wyvislthapj kbypun aol mpyza mld khfz vm aylhatlua huk jhyl zovbsk il lelyjpzlk dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; kyvdzpulzz; olhkhjol; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsslynpj klythapapz; hsvwljph; jvumbzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; mhapnbl; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwvaluzpvu; sln jyhtwz; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hyyofaotphz; jhykphj chscbsvwhaof; kphyyovlh; kfzwuvlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nhzayvpualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua-sprl zfukyvtl; whssvy; whyhlzaolzph; wlypjhykphs lmmbzpvu; wlypjhykpapz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; apuupabz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Lhapun kpzvyklyz; ofwlyaluzpvu; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; whaovsvnpjhs nhtispun; wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz; zlpgbyl; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zayvrl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aylhatlua zovbsk il dpaokyhdu pm nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun vjjbyz.</w>\u\u\u
<w>Huapwhyrpuzvuphu kybn aolyhwf zovbsk ulcly il zavwwlk hiybwasf hz aopz jhyyplz h zthss ypzr vm ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl.</w>
